text: The Province of Trieste (, ) is a province in the autonomous Friuli-Venezia Giulia region of Italy. Its capital is the city of Trieste. It has an area of 212 kmÂ², and a total population of 242,235 (2001). It has a coastal length of 48.1 km. There are 6 communes in the province.
title: Province of Trieste
